website_summaries.verdict: While the Bose SoundTrue has only minor design changes from the earlier AE2i, it remains one of the most comfortable-to-wear, full-size headphones, and it also sounds good.
pros: sealed earcups isolate the wearer from ambient noise
cons: Sound can be a tad brash

customer_reviews.title: Misrepresented Blemished Model
customer_reviews.text: I actually like the headphones, but I am disappointed in Amazon, Bose or whoever is the actual seller of this product. The product appears to function just fine, but it is clearly a factory second / blemished model. After reading several other reviews to confirm this, the white and blue model has a very easily seen red blemish on the head band. Mine is almost 1 inch long. I plan to keep the headphones because I did get a good price and like them, but I would like to have known I was buying a blemished model beforehand. I will mostly be using them at home.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie L. Buck Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I am happy to say that I've been able to wear them ...
customer_reviews.text: They are a bit pricy for headphones, but they are Bose. I finally bought this pair because I could wear them over my glasses in comfort. Now that I've been working at my desk with these, I am happy to say that I've been able to wear them for 8 hours without hurting my face or ears from this and my glasses. The sound quality didn't overwhelm me, but I sure like them. Another very positive note is that the cable is detachable. I bought an extra cable for home and only have to transport the headphones back and forth between work and home. It comes in a sharp carrying case for just this kind of usage.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Sticky and Broken
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones about 8 months ago. They arrived in terrible condition. They were badly stained and covered in some sort of sticky crud, which I was able to clear away with sanitation wipes. The wire was slightly damaged that connected the headphones to my device, but overall it was functional and the sound quality was "good enough." Now, 8 months later the headphones don't even work at all. Very disappointed. I don't think this is an issue with Bose and more likely an issue with whoever the heck previously owned these headphones that clearly must have dunked them in vats of coffee and custard pudding.
customer_reviews.author: Brigid Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not noise canceling, but still cancels noise!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were perfect for my recent trip to Europe. They helped drown out the noise of airplane travel (despite not being noise canceling, I definitely noticed a great difference when they were on vs off my ears). They're comfortable, fitting around my hear and stay on my head. Plus they're WAY more comfortable than earbuds. My only complaint is that the cord requires some twisting occasionally in the airplane armrest in order to have sound come from both ears. Also, when using these on a phone call, it's odd to not hear my own voice playback into the headphones, causing me to almost shout.
customer_reviews.author: AC Slater

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good headphones
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good headphones, delivered quickly with great packaging. Comes with an audio jack which you can take off for storage. Fits nicely over the ears and looks great. Would definitely recommend, although keep in mind it is not bass heavy. Side note though, the audio up and down buttons on the jack does not work with android phones. The middle button plays and pauses music on a Galaxy S5 though. Have not tested the mic function, (if it even exists). 4 out of 5 because it feels great, but is pricey, has no android/pc support with the buttons and could be just a tad more bass orientated.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, questionable cable
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones so much. They don't feel too tight, they block out just the right amount of noise, and the built-in remote works amazingly with my iPod and iPhone. It's been like experiencing my music library for the first time. The biggest drawback for me is the cable itself. It's so long, thin, and delicate that it snags and tangles easily. I owned this pair of headphones for two weeks before the cable needed to be replaced. The headphones themselves are stellar, but the durability of the cable is awful. Luckily, I was able to order a new cable on Amazon with ease but I think it detracts from an otherwise exceptional pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Rhubarb

customer_reviews.title: great still I returned .....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this along with Sennheiser 429s and tested against each other and my existing Bose Trueport headphones. The new and old Bose sounded the same but the new is great on comfort. Coming to sennheiser this brand has more balanced sound, the bose emphasized more on vocals so if you like a particular song then you would like bose but if you are like me listening to online radios like pandora/spotify/iheart then you will appreciate the sennheiser as it has more balance to all instruments and vocals where as i felt more bose is biased to vocals
customer_reviews.author: deepboys

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are better than Beats
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are better than Beats. I have owned a pair of Beats headphones and they broke after about 9 months. This same thing happened to another family member of mine that had Beats. This headphones are super comfortable and super durable and the case is amazing as well. They sound just as amazing as Beats headphones do, but the around the ear style is so much more comfortable. 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Taylour Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great for TMJ sufferers
customer_reviews.text: I have some pretty bad jaw pain from TMJ but wanted a nice pair of headphones to listen to music at work. The problem is that most headphones apply too much pressure to the temples and after a few minutes would give me a nasty headache. I tried even high end headphones like the Audio-Technica ATH-M50x. These, however, are fantastic. Great sound and very little pressure. I can wear these for hours with no problems at all. I don't think you'll find better headphones (combination of pressure and sound).
customer_reviews.author: KameleonZero

customer_reviews.title: Musician loves them
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality! I gave them as a gift to my son for Christmas last year. He is a music major in college so sound quality is very important to him. He has been using them for almost a year now and still loves them. They have held up well and still sound great. He has had to replace the cord, but that is because he lost it, not because of any problem with it. I was one of those people who swore they would never pay more than $30 for headphones, but I was happy with sale I purchased these under and they have been worth every penny I paid for them.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Cat Lady

customer_reviews.title: Sound super, look great!
customer_reviews.text: Easily my favorite pair of headphones!! These things are built well and are the most comfortable headphones I've ever used. The foam around the cup is almost like memory foam. They are gentle on your ears and head. Your ears don't sweat after long use, and they don't ache either. The sound is super clear and crisp too. Bass has a great unmuffled sound, that allows you to enjoy the song and the beat as well. These look great, feel great, and sound super!!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Finally!  Headphones that I can actually wear!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, headphones that don't hurt my ears, because they don't sit ON my ears. I have very small ear canals, and have always been unable to use earbuds because they either don't stay in or they are very painful. Other headphones become very painful after just a short time of listening. My only wish is that they were bluetooth capable, but that's something I can deal with. The sound is wonderful, and the comfort is absolutely heavenly. Thank you, Bose!!!
customer_reviews.author: CarolTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth is great, sound great. Must use wired (included) when radio on phone is used during walks..
customer_reviews.text: Bose is great.. and having blue tooth is good. You cannot use it with your phone radio as the radio needs a wire and plug as an antenna. I have a wired unit that I use when I walk and wish to listen to my phone radio. But it does come with an extra wire (and connector) for that.
customer_reviews.author: H.

customer_reviews.title: They sound great, but...
customer_reviews.text: They sound great, they're comfortable, they're not too heavy, and they look really good, but the rubber on the audio cord degrades quickly with any amount of heat and becomes sticky, so you can't leave it in the car on a warm day. Very nice headphones but you may want to buy another cable with it just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing!! They feel extremely comfortable and pleasant around the ear. The only headphone I like just a little more is the Bose SoundTrue on the ear. This headphones does an amazing job of blocking outside noises, too good in fact!! I was listening to music in my man cave and my wife was yellIng at me that dinner was ready. I told my wife to actually touch me if she needs me because I can't hear anything outside of the headphones just my music.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: middle level performance for the sound but have a bad feeling on the outfit
customer_reviews.text: Just receive the package through the transmit company, open the wholly new package and comfort to wear, middle level performance for the sound but have a bad feeling on the outfit!!! please look at the photo that the quality for the outfit is terrible, there is a unknow red mark on the 100% new headphone and can not be wiped out, and it more like in the plastic together with the white!!! and now I am not sure how to exchange the new one since a transport is from US.... and I am not in US
customer_reviews.author: TTPlanet

customer_reviews.title: The best street/bus/train/ferry headphones
customer_reviews.text: * Excelent Audio * Light. Really, as advertised you barely feel them. Can be used for several hours * Nice styling. That mint color in the cable contrast very well with dark clothing * The cable length is just perfect * No need to worry about batteries as with noise cancelling / wireless options Comming from the QuietComfort 2 I can say SoundTrue headphones aren't the best for the noisy office nor are the best audio fidelity offering from Bose. But I wouldn't use a QC2 in the street. Its heavier, easier to break, the cable will break in a couple of bus trips.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Urdaneta

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It was shipped in a bubble bag, no instructions, no carrying case which is shows in advertising. Not as happy. Also could not increase volume . Very unhappy with seller. I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: Twinkle Toes

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't use these for home stereo. I bought these to use with my Android phone when I'm exercising at the gym. They definitely sound better than the Inexpensive no names I bought at a close out store. The thing I appreciate the mosr, while I don't believe they would be good for blocking out outside noise on a flight, they are definitely more than enough to block out the Techno music the gym plays. Or as I call it "Work boots in a clothes dryer" music.
customer_reviews.author: Wrecking Crew Fan

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: These headphones provide as good of sound as one would find with a $20 set of ear buds. I found no quality difference. These headphones also have a similar noise pollution compared to a cheaper set of headphones. In other words, the sound coming through the headphones can be heard from a person sitting within 3 feet when listening to music at a moderate volume (i.e. the same thing was observed when listening through $20 ear buds). Finally, the headphones are comfortable, but I found no other real advantage when compared to a cheaper set of ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: M. P.

customer_reviews.title: Bose SoundTrue Headphones Around-Ear Style
customer_reviews.text: This is an early review. I just received my Bose SoundTrue Headphones yesterday. I am learning Spanish and listen to a lot of audio books in Spanish or instructional material. I wanted headphones that had a very crisp, clear sound. These headphones are excellent for that. I tried them also for music and I think they are great in that arena too. For me, there is adequate bass that is well balanced. I don't care for the muddiness that can accompany many bass rich headphones. It's all personal preference and I really love the sound I am getting from these Bose for the purpose I am using them for.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Nutter

customer_reviews.title: extremely comfortable for long term use
customer_reviews.text: Really isn't a fault of the headphones themselves, but if you are a person who likes bass, these aren't the right headphones for you. I have the V-MODA crossfade LP (Over-ear), Sennheiser HD 598 Special Edition (Over-ear), and these. All of them were amped with FiiO E10K USB DAC and Headphone Amplifier. Pros: Noise isolation (good for office use), crystal clear sound, extremely comfortable for long term use, and extremely light compared to other headphones. Cons: Not much bass to them Still overall really damn good headphones. However if you like bass go with the V-MODA ones. I did originally purchase these as a gift for some friends and they let me try them out.
customer_reviews.author: Pete C

customer_reviews.title: Good and comfortable headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are very comfortable and since they are over the ear they do not strain on your ear and you can use them for long periods of time. The sound quality is great and while wearing them you are less aware to the background noise around you. After using them for several years the ear padding begin to crumble and disconnect so you need to replace the pads.
customer_reviews.author: Dror

customer_reviews.title: Comfiest to wear.
customer_reviews.text: If comfort is the primary requirement, this is the model to get. I have both the ATH-M50 (around ear), and Sennheiser Amperior, these are by far the most comfortable I have worn. That includes the top-of-the line studio Beats as well. The sound was about as flat/neutral as it gets. Nothing terribly exciting, and for the price, I would hope for a lot more from all ranges, and especially the bottom end. ATH-M50 are my go-to for price/sound/comfort ratio. Sennheiser if I want a small improvement to sound. Bose if I'm looking for comfort (i.e. long plane rides).
customer_reviews.author: KWMK

customer_reviews.title: but for frontpanel or laptop (what I bought it for) it's good.
customer_reviews.text: Nicer than the pictures make it out to be. The leather of the ear piece and headrest is made of really comfy and soft feeling leather. The sound they produce is clean, but I'm not an audio expert. They also come with a leather carrying case that seems to be made from the same comfy leather. Cord length may be to short to be plugged into the back of a computer though, but for frontpanel or laptop (what I bought it for) it's good.
customer_reviews.author: James Mason

customer_reviews.title: BOSE quality and sound!
customer_reviews.text: Saw the mixed reviews so not sure if I received a different pair. Overall they are very comfortable! Sound quality is great (as expected from Bose). I am not sure I like the detachable wire but I guess that is normally the part that breaks so it may save me money down the line vs buying new. They are light weight and do not hurt your ears even with sustained use. The microphone is good and on long conference calls there are no issues with people hearing me.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: These were used when I bought them. However, when I received them, they were in a sealed box in brand new condition! These headphones are perfect! I use them every single day at the gym and even sweat pretty badly in them, but I wipe them off after every session and they are holding up really well. Sound quality is amazing (as Bose normally is), and even though they don't specify noise cancellation, these do block out a lot of background noise. LOVE THESE HEADPHONES!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight & comfortable, I wanted to love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight & comfortable, I wanted to love these headphones. They sounded fine when they worked. Unfortunately audio failed in the left earphone after maybe half a dozen light uses. More unfortunately was the fact that this was 37 days after purchase, so Amazon won't deal with them. Most unfortunate of all, Bose refuses any kind of return or service of a product purchased from any site not named bose.com. Frankly, for $180, I expect a product that's going to work for longer than a month. At this price point I find it pathetic that the company refuses to stand behind their product. I will be looking elsewhere for all future headphone purchases, and recommend you do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Tessmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Headphones to consider if comfort is a top priority
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable headphones with balanced sound. I bought it because I travel a lot on cross continental flights and didn't want to be bogged down by always using earbuds which can be uncomfortable after a while. These are very light in construction (which as a con, actually makes them feel and look a bit cheap), but are very nicely cushioned and you can definitely wear them over an extended period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie M

customer_reviews.title: Lovin my new mint headphones :)
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I would like to thank the vendor for shipping my order really fast. As far as the headphones go, I am truly happy and satisfied with my mint soundtrue headphones. They are super comfortable and stylish. Few of the factors I considered when I was searching for my first ever headphones. As far as audio is concerned, I won't claim that I am an expert but I am satisfied with the sound these bose headphones delivers. I use them mainly for watching videos and listening to music as well. I've tried disclosure's when the fire starts to burn, let's just say I started dancing :) hehe.
customer_reviews.author: matchalover

customer_reviews.title: ... because just had ear buds and they weren't very comfortable, so my relative had an older model of ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these because just had ear buds and they weren't very comfortable, so my relative had an older model of these and Just started using them. I asked for them for Christmas and they are the best. They are comfortable for as long as you wear them. I have an issue with the wife becomjng disconnected, so I like that you can change the cord and not just the whole set of headphones. They turn out if you don't want to wear them but listen to music, like speakers. Also, the case is very durable and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They're Bose... expect quality!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are absolutely amazing!!!!! The sound is crystal clear from the strings of guitars to the demanding frequencies of dub step. They really do block out 90% of the external sound and deliver deep crisp sound along with being super comfortable. I wear glasses while at home on the computer and I love being able to wear these for hours at a time with no headaches. They are a must have for relationships with gamers.
customer_reviews.author: Sometimesokay

customer_reviews.title: Great for long flights
customer_reviews.text: I got these headphones for pretty cheap and thats the main reason i bought them. I wouldn't buy these for full price, because i would just get the newer model but if they are on sell, i would recommend buying them. These are great headphones for traveling and watching movies on your laptop. I listen to a lot of music and these headphones sound great with every genre. I have used these headphones on several long flights and they are super comfortable. I did a lot research before i bought these headphones and i wasn't let down at all.
customer_reviews.author: jjo380

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my hubby
customer_reviews.text: These headsets were a great gift for my hubby. He loves them and they are great at sound quality and cancelling out other noise.
customer_reviews.author: Trio Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Light, Comfy, and Excellent Sound
customer_reviews.text: Feather light and comfortable to wear, with excellent sound. You hardly are aware that you are wearing them, they are so light. And the cushions over the ears make them easy to keep on for long periods of time without hurting. I do wish I had spend the extra $$$s and bought the sound-cancelling ear phones, though. You can still hear outside noises, which don't necessarily interfere with the sound but are somewhat distracting.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Bovary

customer_reviews.title: ... mean what can I say they're BOSE headphones they're awesome and one of the most comfortable headphones I've ever ...
customer_reviews.text: I mean what can I say they're BOSE headphones they're awesome and one of the most comfortable headphones I've ever owned I have a pretty big head and these headphones fit without any sort of discomfort I love these headphones and recommend them to anybody who's looking for a comfortable set of headphones with premium sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: vic

customer_reviews.title: Comfort comfort comfort.
customer_reviews.text: These are the bomb. Just returned Sennheiser Momentum Headphones which sounded amazing. But of all the headphones I've tried to switch too including beats, none of them compare to the comfort of Bose. Others get tight and uncomfortable after 20mins. I can wear these for hours watching movies , listening to books , music etc. They're soo comfortable. And the value is good. Sound quality really nice too. Unless you're an audiophile or DJ/producer these will do the job perfectly. And no need for the higher priced noise canceling models.
customer_reviews.author: Hambik Oktanyan

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and great quality.
customer_reviews.text: These Bose headphones are super comfortable. They fit over my ears perfectly. I've had issues in the past of headphones and earbuds giving me headaches. I can even lay down with these on and there is no aggravation. The mint color is really pretty. They come with a nice case as well for storage. They worked phenomenal on all of my Apple devices.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M

customer_reviews.title: Bose SoundTrue Headphone in Mint
customer_reviews.text: Join me as I review Bose Soundtrue Around Ear Headphones!! 1. These are very stylish and I feel very cool wearing them! 2. They are super comfortable, light weight, and I even forget I'm wearing them! 3. The sound quality is really nice. I cannot go back to lower quality earphones now! I LOVE THESE!
customer_reviews.author: Auntieemily

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good, slightly eh.
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality with my LG G3, very comfortable. They do have a quiet static hum when listening which is disappointing. It's not noticeable during louder songs but if I'm listening to something quiet it's mildly annoying. Don't quite understand why these headphones are specifically made for Apple products to the detriment of other users. That said, they're very comfy, I have quite a few ear piercings and on ear headphones get uncomfortable after a short while. Apart from the static the sound is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L.

customer_reviews.title: The on-ear sound fine, but found that after an hour or so
customer_reviews.text: I also own a pair of Bose sound true on-ear style headphones. The on-ear sound fine, but found that after an hour or so, they'd feel a little tight on my ears. Purchased these after trying them on first. These are comfortable for quite a while longer, even wearing glasses. I do use the on-ear style but only for shorter times. I don't pretend to be a great audiophile, but I think these sound fine and are the most comfortable headphones I've had.
customer_reviews.author: barb

customer_reviews.title: flaky coating on earpads
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Cable is 2m long. Why? 1.2m please. Update: Lowering stars as the ear pads have deteriorated. It became very sticky and the coating on the ear pad which provide the grey colouring (i bought the white, blue, grey model) starts to flake and it is just a mess. Looks like long term use of this headphones it not possible.
customer_reviews.author: Aswin A.

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound, Cancels Outside Noise, Overall Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: These were an impulse splurge that really worked out. Here's why: -they cancel out all the noise in the room -they make the sound seem as though it's coming from all directions -they don't squash your ears -there is a volume control on the wire, which is very convenient -sound quality is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Yoda Sunrose

customer_reviews.title: Very Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have a noise cancelling Bose headphone set which is comfortable and well made. I bought this set knowing they were not noise cancelling but what really,surprised me was how uncomfortable they were on my head. Cannot wear my glasses with them at all as they are so tight that my ears start to hurt after about fifteen minutes. Not worth the money. I expected better from Bose.
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones, however, do start to deteriorate over time.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and very comfortable. I've had them for about 2 years now and use them frequently, however, for the last couple of months the material on the ear cushioning has began peeling off and where the fabric was attached to headphone itself had came undone so now the foam of the ear piece is revealed. I believe you can replace this, but it is a bit upsetting. Otherwise, great headphones!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on Black Friday as they were only $75. They have great sound quality and the ear cover parts are super soft. I mainly bought them because at work I used normal headphones, but too much sound going on around me would be distracting..... these headphones really silence outside noises and allow me to focus on my computer work..... it also has a very long cord which allow me to charge my phone/I pod on the floor and reach my head with no problem. I recommend them for anyone looking to use for similar use, or travel as these would be great on an airplane.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Good headphone where after daughter worn out her 1st set, bought a second set based on how long the 1st set lasted
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I bought for my daughter, she worn the first one until it was so worn out the wires frayed and you couldn't hear hear anything coming out of it. For the amount of use that the head phone went under, it is a good buy and when you get what you buy, it is a well worth investment to spend a little more for this Bose headphone.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Q

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these on a black Friday sale. They are very comfortable and light weight. The sound is good quality but the cable that comes with it is very thin and cheap feeling. If your an audiophile you probably won't like these but for the average person the sound is good. Not to much base which is great for me. For the money spent on these it should come with a better quality cable otherwise a great product for everyday use around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Next time it's Beats
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Sound quality is great, but after having them less than a month (they were given to my daughter as a Christmas gift), the male adapter bent to the point that it can not be used. This also happened with the last pair we gave our son (in almost exactly the same place). I hate to say it, but I guess it's Beats from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: Andra

customer_reviews.title: So Happy With These
customer_reviews.text: I just received these today thanks to Amazon's super fast delivery. Man, these are absolutely gorgeous. The mint color is PERFECT! They sound great while listening to Joe's latest release Bridges and they are very comfortable being over the ear headphones. I'm sure you can get cheaper ones that sound as good but I doubt you find the quality used for these. I absolutely love them.
customer_reviews.author: Nette

customer_reviews.title: I love my headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love my headphones!!! I compared them @ Best Buy to Beats and these Bose headphones are so much more lightweight! The sound is of course awesome as well! I've tested them out with a variety of different music genres and they all sound AMAZING! love them! totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: NT419

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are pretty average- not super great sound quality for the price ...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are pretty average- not super great sound quality for the price and the left ear cuts out about half the time. About after 1/2 a year the plastic on the pillows started to rub off as well. They are stylish, but not the best of quality coming from such a good brand.
customer_reviews.author: InkyNight

customer_reviews.title: highs and mids sound great, comfort is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Ok, after owning many other headphones and coming to Bose for the second time i have to say that these are not bass heavy, if so you would have to change the EQ settings on your player to feel some, highs and mids sound great, comfort is amazing. Another issue (at least for me) is the lenght of the cable which is like 2 mts long! Its just too much !
customer_reviews.author: d.ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Great, both my boys loved them.  NOT wireless if they come up in a wireless search
customer_reviews.text: I searched for wireless headphones and these came up in the search but both my boys love them and don't want to exchange them. When I received them I saw they weren't wireless so I got small behind the ear running wireless headphones to fill that function--they liked the solution so I am happy. The Bose name usually gives you a top quality product.
customer_reviews.author: LkCh Gus

customer_reviews.title: Three blemished models in a row. Stay away from the white version.
customer_reviews.text: Alright, so today i received my second replacement of this product, which means that in total I had three items in my hand. Maybe I am just unlucky, but ALL OF THEM have red/brown ugly marks on the bow (see picture but sorry for the poor quality), which is nothing but an insolence. I will now keep one of it since the sound quality is great and I got them very pricy on a Black Friday deal. Unfortunately, Amazon didn't let me change the color either. Therefore: One Star!
customer_reviews.author: B. Domokos

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Best sounding headphones I used in a long time; both for music & accepting phone calls from your cell phone. The noise reduction is amazing & outside noise is extremely minimal. The color is very modern & appealing. Very comfortable. Price is not bad for the quality of headphone received.
customer_reviews.author: t2tigger

customer_reviews.title: They're Bose - They're what you would expect
customer_reviews.text: Nice look - Great sound. They're what you would expect from Bose. Some people think they are a bit strong on base, but you should be able to tune that in your equalizer. I would be more concerned if they did not have enough base, as it is tougher to increase what is not there. Makes a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Maverick

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. I got them for around $75-80. They aren't true noise cancelling, but since they are good quality wrap around the ears, they do block some of the outside noise. Came in a nice carrying case. No problems yet, I've used them on several long airplane trips overseas. I'd buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: jpcmpls

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones
customer_reviews.text: Form: Light weight, very comfortable to wear. I've used for 9 hrs in flight Fit: Great for small heads (kids), medium heads (wife's) and big heads (mine!) Function: Great sound - just what you'd expect from Bose Note: these are not noise canceling. Bose noise canceling headsets are nicer, but if you don't require noise canceling, highly highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: jjd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect except for not universal AUX cord
customer_reviews.text: Here's the thing. I like the headphones. Sound is great, comfort is awesome, and they're super durable to boot (pun very much intended) HOWEVER, if you dare lose your AUX cord, you're in for a not so fun treat. The aux connector as you might've noticed, is smaller and not the standard size. So, if you're stuck traveling and lose it on the first day, you'll have a very silent vacation (as I did). Would not buy again for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Barazani

customer_reviews.title: Worst product
customer_reviews.text: Start breaking after limited use, doesnt worth it the dollar
customer_reviews.author: sibi

customer_reviews.title: These are very good headphones. They replaced a good but old pair ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very good headphones. They replaced a good but old pair of Beats, that snapped one day at the gym. Comparing these to the Beats, when listening to music on these I feel like I am in a room with music, much more so than the Beats. They also fit better, and don't rely on the compression factor to stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Allison

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Received these headphones in early November. I used them infrequently and found them finicky to use. The cord did not have a strong connection. After only a few uses, they are not working at all. My son discovered that using a different connector cord fixed the problem. I'm contacting Amazon to discuss return or replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Marie

customer_reviews.title: but really no better sound quality than the earbuds I was using before
customer_reviews.text: Just OK. I was looking for an alternative to earbuds so I purchased these headphones based on the Bose reputation and the user reviews I read. In the end, they are ok, but really no better sound quality than the earbuds I was using before. Again, this is not a poor product, just not what I expected based on the Bose quality reputation.
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are super! The sound is great, wouldn't expect anything less from Bose. I love that it fits around my ears and doesn't sit on top of them, after a long time my head does get a little sore, but I wouldn't trade these for anything else I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: BirdNerdGirl

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I received these headphones for Christmas and they are awesome! They are very comfortable on my ears and even though they are not the sound proof ones, they block out outside sounds just great for me! Love these headphones! I went to best buy and tried on other brands with headphones that cover your ears and these were the most comfortable to me.
customer_reviews.author: Jabrody08

customer_reviews.title: Functions well but some type of ink marking on the plastic molding.
customer_reviews.text: This was an Xmas gift so was disappointed when my daughter pointed out the marking on the head piece. Item functions well but there was a marking on the white plastic that would not come off. A bit disappointed in the fact that these were supposedly brand new. Almost looks like an ink mark with a light pink background about an inch long. The marking on the plastic makes them look used.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: love them. I got my self and my boyfriend a pair. we use them all the time on airline flights. He uses his when he editing on his computer as well. They are super nice!! great sound, super soft. Lovely. I got him the black and I got the mint. They are so nice. They also come with a case such a nice bonus. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these headphones! The sound is amazing and i love that the cable is able to disconnect from the headphones so you don't have to worry. If the cable breaks you can just buy another 3.5mm cable and you're good to go!
customer_reviews.author: SmartShopper

customer_reviews.title: ... Skull Candy and they sound by far and way better than these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I have a very used pair of Skull Candy and they sound by far and way better than these headphones. I am a bit disappointed with Bose. Not sure if its my I-phone or the headphones but I am unable to turn sound up to a desired amount. On the highest level I can still hear back-ground noise clear.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and excellent sound quality. I couldn't believe the things I heard on songs I thought I knew by heart (correct words and some noises and apparent talking in the background in the studio on some songs)! I would buy again if I needed another pair. Excellent quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cile

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for the True sound. low on Bass and  bad cable quality :)
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are awesome for sound quality but broke the cable already :( Should have made a better quality cable One star is lost just for the bad quality of cable else the best and lightest and the most comfortable headphones ever but it is kinda uncomfortable wearing it around the neck but wearing it around the ear is best best with glasses on as well
customer_reviews.author: Mathew George

customer_reviews.title: Great set of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set of headphones. I'm impressed with the quality so far and how much noise that they stave off around me while listening to music. Came with a decent carry case with the headphones as well. Of course these are not the ones that don't complete noise cancel, but I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A Craig

customer_reviews.title: love, love, love
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these headphones. I got them for Christmas last year and they are still working flawlessly. They're super comfortable, I wear them while studying at school, mowing, while recording music, and my ears never hurt. They have a nice full sound, and while they're not noise-cancelling, they do a good job of minimizing outside noises and the sound quality is great. I also love the carrying case they come in. I can transfer them in my backpack, purse, car and not worry about them getting messed up. Overall, super happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely Comfy and lightweight. I like these so much better than headphones like Beats because the sound is more even, and not so bass heavy that it gives me a headache. While they are not specifically made for reducing outside noise from your surroundings, the fact that they are around-ear style does make it block out some more sound than an on-ear headphone. So this blocks enough sound off for me without completely isolating myself from the outside world. This way I'd be able to hear enough in case there was some sort of emergency going on. Anyway, I love these.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: So far I have really enjoyed these headphones
customer_reviews.text: So far I have really enjoyed these headphones. They are not too tight and fit nicely over the ear. Blue color is uplifting and fun. Even though these are not noise cancelling, the sound quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: I love them- I wear them when i'm flying
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are incredible. I love them- I wear them when i'm flying, studying or working in lab. The cord is very long so you can keep it your phone/ipod in your pocket while you wear them and you dont have to worry about it not being long enough. They are not 100% soundproof but they keep out a lot of sound. This is one of the best purchases I have ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Gabbby22

customer_reviews.title: Leaving a lot to be desired
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting these headphones for years. I finally bought a pair and they aren't that great. The right ear keeps cutting out. And I paid $3.99 for 1 day delivery and it came in 2 days. I have prime so I pretty much paid for the free 2 day delivery.
customer_reviews.author: HelloJennyReviews

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had these earphones close to six months, waiting to review to make sure I stayed as happy as I am. Very comfortable and perfect for a noisy office space! I can wear these all morning, and when I keep the volume reasonable, I can still hear when people are trying to get my attention.
customer_reviews.author: Lillie

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: I had Bose headphones years ago and switched to Beats - but Beats were always so uncomfortable. I am so happy I switched back to these Bose. They are extremely comfortable, I can wear them for many hours without any issues. The sound quality is great - especially with soft/indie/jazz tunes. They are definitely not noise canceling though.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey N.B.

customer_reviews.title: ... years but use them rarely and yet the pleather like material that covers the ear is cracking off
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for two years but use them rarely and yet the pleather like material that covers the ear is cracking off. I would expect Bose products to be of better quality. Also, It would be nice if I could simply replace the 'around the ear' pads but that doesn't seem to be an option.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Sound GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are exceptional headphones. They are light weight, comfortable, and sound amazing. Also, when using the microphone feature, it sounds perfect. We have a pair of skull candy headphones and we tried a pair of Sony headphones but Bose wins for all around comfort and performance. I highly recommend these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great and keeps my ears warm while cross-country skiing!
customer_reviews.text: They are super light and not at all a "head-clamp" as others can be. I also like that the cord simply unplugs if it gets caught on something (it's not hardwired into the headphones). Also, it's clear to other skiers who sneak up behind me that I can't hear easily.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Clark

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are fine. Did not see anything on the add that they were used. Disappointed they were not clearly marked as Used, but they work well.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Martin

customer_reviews.title: Cord broke in less than 3 months. ($30 purchase)
customer_reviews.text: The cord broke less than 3 months after I got these headphones. I loved them but now I have to spend $30 on a cord because it does not work anymore. Honestly, I wouldn't have gotten them if someone told me that only a few months after getting them I would have to spend an extra $30 to get them to work again.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality. Unfortunately the cord broke, it was our fault - bent badly, so we had to order a new one. The ear phones themselves are great and the protective case is very helpful for transporting them in a backpack for school.
customer_reviews.author: Manda C. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Had them on for 12 hrs on my flight home and after a while I didn't realise I had them on. They are extremely comfortable to wear and have amazing sound. Because they cup my (large) ears just perfectly they muffled the airplane noise dramatically. Would def recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Cup the ear and block outside noise. Sometimes makes ...
customer_reviews.text: Cup the ear and block outside noise. Sometimes makes my ears hurt, but only when having a netflix tv series marathon. Cheap sony's didn't do that but then again they don't block outside noise as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Enix

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality. I love how the earpieces fit around the ear. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Crystal Clear Listening and at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Last pair of these same headphones lasted three years and they would have lasted longer if I wouldn't of lost them in moving houses. I went a few months without owning another pair and I finally caved and bought a new pair. With the same price point as the old pair, they have new features like the cord volume adjust and headphone piece that made something great, even better. The sound quality remained consistent and I am grateful that I bought these headphones again. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Thaddaeus Immink

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is noticeably worse than other typical headphones in the 100 to 200 ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is noticeably worse than other typical headphones in the 100 to 200 dollar range though I do like that they are lightweight and easy to travel with. So far no issues. I am happy that I waited a bit to buy them for the price to go down since the new model just came out.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Very good headphones !!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, very good sound !! They're reasonably priced too (I got them for 74.99$ over black friday sales) and for that amount, they're of pretty good quality. Plus it came with the case which holds the headphones very snugly. I just wish there was a way to extend the cord or if the cord was longer. They are comfortable & look great too. If you are looking for something not extremely expensive but of great quality, then this is a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amrapali

customer_reviews.title: it is good but...
customer_reviews.text: great product and comfortable however: 1. sound leaks outside 2. Bose is well known of their sound quality, and do not enhance the base. 3. the cable is too thin that worries you.
customer_reviews.author: Yanal S.

customer_reviews.title: These have a wonderful sound and the around the ear feature really cuts ...
customer_reviews.text: I chose wired so I can use them on an airplane and be able to plug into whatever entertainment is offered. These have a wonderful sound and the around the ear feature really cuts out extra noise, even though they are not noise canceling.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage around ears
customer_reviews.text: Good coverage around ears, light weight and comfortable. unfortunately the wire isn't very good because I have to twist it to get sound in both ears, it's very finicky. It is nice that the wire is detachable so you can just use the headphones as earmuff to block sound.
customer_reviews.author: Aportie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bose Sound
customer_reviews.text: For my daughter's birthday. I tried them and loved the base sound. The highs were ok, not earth shattering, but good. Over the ear is very comfortable and block out extraneous sound pretty well. A good alternative to their active noise cancelling headsets.
customer_reviews.author: D. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable for many hours, even when wearing my eyeglasses. Good sound, but I'm not a music buff. I use them at work to block out neighbor noise. Perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: J Bug

customer_reviews.title: I love that these headphones go around your ear so they ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that these headphones go around your ear so they are comfortable. They just feel flimsy sometimes and the inside pad feels cheap. I like the case they come in. It's convenient to have a separate cord but the one that comes with these headphones are super long.
customer_reviews.author: PoBo

customer_reviews.title: I love them! They bring out the depth in music ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received my Bose headphones after buying on Black Friday. I love them! They bring out the depth in music to give a rich sound experience. They are also very comfortable to wear unlike Apple earphones for iPhone. Definitely worth buying!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Purdy

customer_reviews.title: they have a different sound from the on-ear but are still very nice.
customer_reviews.text: I was going to return these after purchasing the wireless ones but the wireless ones hurt my ears after two hours which by then I switch over to these guys ... they have a different sound from the on-ear but are still very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Bose SoundTrue Headphones Around-Ear Style, Black/Mint
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingPowerful sound, lightweight design SoundTrue headphones feature an advanced acoustic design for clear, natural audio across the full spectrum–from vocalists who hit the high note, right down to a good bass line groove. Go ahead, lose yourself in music. A softly padded headband and memory foam ear cushions stay comfortable no matter how long your playlist is. Convenience and durability More than a statement in style, SoundTrue headphones are designed to provide lasting quality. The audio cable attaches to a single earcup for greater freedom of movement and less tangling. It also detaches for convenient storage. The earcups conveniently fold flat and the headband is collapsible. And the included carrying case makes for easy transport while displaying your design choice. In tune and in touch SoundTrue headphones are designed specifically for use with your iPhone® and other Apple® products. The integrated inline remote located on the back of the microphone, lets you control music functions–adjust volume, play/pause tracks, skip tracks forward/backward, fast forward/rewind and change playlists. You can also switch between calls and music with one–touch ease–all without reaching for your device. Many features are also compatible with today's most popular phones.
feature_bullets: Full and natural sound for all your music
Softly padded headband and memory foam cushions
Also available in an on-ear style

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,126 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
